subject: #dreamstosuccess
body:
Dear Lions and Lionesses

Small steps matter.

There is a reason behind your journey.

https://www.facebook.com/share/v/1FMC4rd6M9/

What is yours?

Ho jayega. Just small steps ma.





------

with regards


PAT team

1. Our focus is you and you matter to us. Do not worry.
2. At the end of the day, placement is not about getting jobs but building
careers and so we will teach you.
3. Sometimes we may not agree with your requests. But rest assured, we will
listen and always help you whenever we can.
4. Follow the rules and we will definitely help you.  "work hard success is
yours".

--

body:
*Dream Core Placement - 2026 Batch*






Name of the Company



*WINFra Technical Consultants*



Category



Dream Core Placement





Date of Visit:



Will be announced later







Eligible Branches



   - All B.Tech & M.Tech (Civil) related branches





Eligibility Criteria

*% in X and XII – 60% or 6.0 CGPA*

*in Pursuing Degree – 60% or 6.0 CGPA*

*in UG (for PGs) – 60% or 6.0 CGPA   *

No Standing Arrears





CTC




*Around 3 LPA*



Stipend



*10000 - 15000*





Last date for Registration


*26th November 2025 (2:00 PM)*







Website



www.winfra.tech




*Location :* Chennai, Kochi & Bangalore.


*Registration:*



*All the interested and eligible students should register in Neo pat portal
on or before


*26th November 2025 (2:00 PM)*



*No Manual Registration & extension will be entertained.*







*Mandatory Note:*



1. Branches, eligibility and date for the selection process are tentative
and subject to change.

2. Please update your resume with all relevant details and projects done,
in Neo pat portal as there would be shortlisting by the company for the
selection process.

3.  Appear for the selection process in formal dress.

4.  Carry your updated Resumes, photos, College photo ID and all other
relevant certificates.

     before the selection process.

5.  Late comers will not be allowed to attend the selection process.



*Dr.Samuel Rajkumar V*



                      (Director of Placements)

*Dr.V.Samuel Rajkumar,* *B.E.,MBA, MHRM, PhD*

subject: Re: TCS process survey pending
body:
Dear Lions

Fill the form again using the mail id in which you got the admit card

Please do it now. Once more if needed

On Tue, Nov 25, 2025 at 3:58 PM Placement Office <
placementoffice@vitbhopal.ac.in> wrote:

> Dear Lions and Lionesses
>
> The students in the list would have got a survey from TCS. They have not
> completed it.
>
> TCSsurveypending
> <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vRSA3gOslMgVK_XYAedbKH2_hOiIbep0GgyQ9-7ipbd8_oGRxkUPtdJVUKKrPWrvA/pubhtml>
>
> Please do it by today 7 pm
>
> with regards
>
> shriram
>
> On Fri, Nov 21, 2025 at 3:25 PM Placement Office <
> placementoffice@vitbhopal.ac.in> wrote:
>
>> Dear Lions and Lionesses
>>
>> The next enrollment is on Dec 1. Please come in PAT formals at 9.30 am on
>> that day
>>
>> Bring the PAT fees receipt, the Academic fees receipt, and proof of
>> having no N or F grades. If vtop is not updated, bring a letter from the
>> COE.
>> If there is any issue, please come on December 1 at 9:30 am, as well. I
>> will look into it.
>> If you have not paid PAT fees, write to manikandan.j@vitbhopal.ac.in. He
>> will help you. Please do not reply to him back as a part of this email.
>> Rather write a fresh email to him.
>>
>> This is the last enrollment/unblocking for the 2026 batch passing out
>> students who do not have N or F grades. We have informed you about the
>> December 1 deadline on multiple occasions. Those who do not have N or F
>> grades or are blocked can decide and come before December 1. Those in
>> placement, the unblocking will start from Dec 1 and it may follow a
>> stricter norm this time.
>>
>> The COE office has given a chance to clear the F grade in the month of
>> December. Some students are undergoing an exam as we speak, and
>> hopefully they will clear it soon.
>>
>> The following are recommended for the late enrollment students who are
>> giving their exam in December or are taking the courses this semester and
>> completing now.
>>
>>    - Work on Codeforces daily and participate in the contests.
>>    - Work on the hackathons
>>    - Have a decent resume
>>    - Complete at least 1 or more global certification, such as
>>       -
>>
>>       *AWS Certified Solutions Architect*
>>       -
>>
>>       *AWS Cloud practitioner *
>>       -
>>
>>       *Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)*
>>       -
>>
>>       *Certified Ethical Hacker*
>>       -
>>
>>       *CompTIA Security+*
>>       -
>>
>>       *Google Certified Professional Cloud Architect*
>>       -
>>
>>       *AWS Certified Data Engineer - Associate*
>>       -
>>
>>       *https://www.salesforceben.com/salesforce-certifications/
>>       <https://www.salesforceben.com/salesforce-certifications/>*
>>       -
>>
>>       *ServiceNow - Certified Application Developer *
>>       -
>>
>>
>>
>> *ServiceNow - Certified System Administrator *
>>       -
>>
>>       *Non-CSE branches can meet us in person for guidance on the above*
>>
>> All those who want to enroll will report on the 6th of January in PAT
>> formals with the hardcopy proof of the above and face the committee for
>> their request. You need to be prepared to report every day and do
>> self-study every day in the lab with no leaves until you get placed. The
>> 6th of Jan is only for the students who are in the F category now. The
>> others must report on Dec 1.  Also, not all the students who report on Jan
>> 6 will be approved. In general, if CDC enrollment is done and you start
>> working hard by December 1, there is a small chance of placement. After
>> that, the chances are less and the funnel of jobs will become smaller and
>> smaller every day. That is why we keep the Dec 1 deadline.  But we will
>> understand the challenging times this year and try to accommodate the F

>>>>>>>>>>> Capstone exemption
>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>> The norms are as follows
>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>    1. This is purely voluntary. No one is forcing you to apply
>>>>>>>>>>>    for capstone exemption. If you do - you agree to all the
>>>>>>>>>>>    terms and conditions
>>>>>>>>>>>    2. No appeal of marks is possible. Your company may give you
>>>>>>>>>>>    100. But if it gets late or the Prog Chair disagrees with the mark, our
>>>>>>>>>>>    marks alone will apply. No appeal of marks or request for revaluation is
>>>>>>>>>>>    accepted
>>>>>>>>>>>    3. Capstone is acceptable only if you complete the duration.
>>>>>>>>>>>    Not for a 2 months process.
>>>>>>>>>>>    4. Report submission physically is mandatory
>>>>>>>>>>>    5. You can help yourself and us by
>>>>>>>>>>>       - creating a small video on an interview question
>>>>>>>>>>>       - creating an interview video that outlines the process
>>>>>>>>>>>       you faced and the answers you gave
>>>>>>>>>>>       - help the juniors with mock interviews
>>>>>>>>>>>    6. The capstone exemption students, especially those in CDC
>>>>>>>>>>>    processes are advised that their Degrees will be issued normally later than
>>>>>>>>>>>    others. For all the UG and PG students in capstone - the marks and process
>>>>>>>>>>>    will be completed by April end and Degrees will be issued as soon as
>>>>>>>>>>>    possible. For the capstone students who are in exemption this process gets
>>>>>>>>>>>    delayed and the students must not write to us because of this. Please
>>>>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>>>>>    7. CDC
>>>>>>>>>>>    - exempted from reviews in person in general. However - in
>>>>>>>>>>>       special cases - the PAT Team and/or the PC may ask you to come physically
>>>>>>>>>>>       in Dec end and March end
>>>>>>>>>>>       - Normally  1 review online at the end of Dec and 1
>>>>>>>>>>>       review online by April end by Dept is mandatory. If the company delays the
>>>>>>>>>>>       marks or the mark by the company is less, we will take these marks.
>>>>>>>>>>>       - Reports must be submitted physically (no online

>>>>>>>>>>>       from the Univ. need to appear for the reviews physically (1 by Nov end and
>>>>>>>>>>>       1 by March end). This is for PAT VIT Bhopal students which are done by us
>>>>>>>>>>>       also. Do not have your HRs mail us. No online process for this.  (no
>>>>>>>>>>>       intermediate reviews) If your HR says they will not allow you to appear in
>>>>>>>>>>>       person, then it is on you. Then 0 marks will be awarded
>>>>>>>>>>>       - Capstone exemption is on a case by case basis
